Groups.Group: Internet Security Benchmarks + Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Level 1

Advanced.DetectScript: #!/bin/bash RV=0 REASON="TIPC is enabled." EXPECT="Disable TIPC." grep -Rql "^install[[:space:]]*tipc[[:space:]]*/bin/true" /etc/modprobe.d/ if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then RV=1 fi if [ $RV -eq 1 ]; then echo $REASON >&1 echo $EXPECT >&2 fi exit $RV

Vulnerability.Title: Disable TIPC
Vulnerability.Description:
The Transparent Inter-Process Communication (TIPC) protocol is designed to provide communication between cluster nodes.
Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
